item.title: openDCIM 3 Install on Ubuntu 14.04
item.description: 中文版链接 What is openDCIM openDCIM is a free web-based Data Center Infrastructure Management application. DCIM means many different things to many different people, and there is a multitude of commercial applications available. The number one goal for openDCIM is to eliminate the excuse for anybody to ever track their data center inventory using a spreadsheet or word processing document again. installation Install Apache, PHP, MySQL Thanks

item.title: 如何在Ubuntu 14.04上安装openDCIM 3
item.description: English version link openDCIM简介 openDCIM是一个免费且开源的数据中心（你也可以说“机房”这个名词=_=）基础网络管理软件。基础网络管理对于不
